SELECT RECORDID , SERVERNAME , TARGETNAME , JOBNAME , JOBUUID , JOBID , JOBTYPE , (CASE when JOBTYPE = 1 then 'Backup' when JOBTYPE = 2 then 'Restore' when JOBTYPE = 3 then 'Backup Full' when JOBTYPE = 4 then 'Backup Incremental ' when JOBTYPE = 5 then 'Backup Verify' when JOBTYPE = 40 then 'Stanby' when JOBTYPE = 21 then 'Restore BMR' when JOBTYPE = 22 then 'Restore Volumn' when JOBTYPE = 23 then 'Restore File ' when JOBTYPE = 24 then 'Restore VM' when JOBTYPE = 26 then 'Restore Migration' when JOBTYPE = 27 then 'Share Recovery Point' when JOBTYPE = 28 then 'Assure Recovery' when JOBTYPE = 60 then 'Start Instant VM JOB' ELSE 'Stop Instant VM JOB' end) AS JOBTYPE_NM , JOBMETHOD , DESTINATIONLOCATION , ENCRYPTIONALGONAME , COMPRESSLEVEL , EXECUTETIME , FINISHTIME , THROUGHPUT , WRITETHROUGHPUT , WRITEDATA , PROCESSEDDATA , PROTECTEDDATA , RPSHOSTNAME , RPSUUID , DATASTORENAME , DATASTOREUUID , SOURCEMACHINENAME , SOURCEMACHINEUUID , STATUS , OPERATIONTYPE , SESSIONGUID FROM JOBHISTORY WHERE 1=1 AND JOBTYPE IN (1,3,4,5)
AND replace(TARGETNAME,'.','') = #{server}
AND JOBTYPE = #{type}::numeric
AND STATUS = #{status}::numeric
AND EXECUTETIME BETWEEN #{startDate}::numeric AND #{endDate}::numeric ORDER BY JOBID DESC

AND EXECUTETIME BETWEEN #{startDate}::numeric AND #{endDate}::numeric ORDER BY JOBID DESC
